Subskills.name: Slick Fingers
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using trigger finger.

Subskills.name: Triggerheavy
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by trigger finger.

Subskills.name: Piercing Mayhem
Subskills.description: Projectiles now pierce and bounce off of terrain dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Gunslinging Slayer
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of projectiles fired by trigger finger.

Subskills.name: Burning Bullethole
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Bullet Fragmentation
Subskills.description: Chance to fragment bullets on hit causing pieces to ricochet around the target.

Subskills.name: Shredder Slugs
Subskills.description: Fire small shredders dealing damage over time and inflicting bleeding. The shredders projectile speed slows down on impact.

Subskills.name: Brand New Cavity
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Supersonic Bullets
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage when using trigger finger.

Subskills.name: Gasoline Covered Ammunition
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Fingertapped Killshot
Subskills.description: Fire a single projectile with significantly increased range and power dealing multiplied damage. Trigger Finger now has a small cooldown.

Subskills.name: It's Raining Bullets
Subskills.description: Fire a burst of projectiles traveling through air and landing on the target location dealing area of effect damage.
